page.title: 18RELIGIONS IN KNIGHTSRIDGE
page.content: The majority of practising Christians in Knightsridge belong to the Ecumenical Parish congregation which worships in Knightsridge Primary School. Roman Catholics from Knightsridge worship in St. Peter's R.C. Church which was recently built in Carmondean. They previously used Knightsridge Primary School hall but Mass was celebrated at a different time from the Protestant service. Also in Knightsridge we have many practising Jehovah's Witnesses who have to travel outwith Knightsridge to worship as a congregation. There is no provision made for Baptists, Pentecostals or other Christian denominations, nor for Muslims although these groups are represented in Knightsridge.
